effect.en: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.
effect.es: Este Pokémon también se hace 30 puntos de daño a sí mismo.
effect.it: Questo Pokémon infligge anche 30 danni a se stesso.
effect.pt: Este Pokémon também causa 30 pontos de dano a si mesmo.
effect.de: Dieses Pokémon fügt auch sich selbst 30 Schadenspunkte zu.

effect.en: Both Active Pokémon are Knocked Out.
effect.fr: Les deux Pokémon Actifs sont mis K.O.
effect.es: Ambos Pokémon Activos quedan Fuera de Combate.
effect.it: Entrambi i Pokémon attivi vengono messi KO.
effect.pt: Ambos os Pokémon Ativos são Nocauteados.

description.en: In the moment that it gulps down its prey, the inside of its shell is exposed, but to this day, no one has ever seen that sight.
